course_description: This course provides an overview of forensic nursing and the clinical application of forensic science. Focus is on the interface of healthcare and legal issues, e.g., murder, abuse, forensic evaluation, evidence collection/preservation, multidisciplinary teamwork, ethical/legal responsibilities, and prevention/intervention strategies.
sections: Class Nbr: 1973, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: T. Sheridan, Status: Open
